title: What is the saddest emotional pain song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hate you, love you Bazzi-why You know wassup-Kehlani Out of love-Alessia Cara Toxic- Kehlani Valentines Day- Kehlani Everybody’s business-Kehlani I don’t want to-Alessia Cara Stay- Zedd ft Alessia Cara Heart on Ice- Rod wave Ratchet Life- Star cast ( from the t.v show) Long way home- Star Cast My Love(Star Cast) Avril Lavigne- My happy ending Avril Lavigne- Complicated Rihannna- Love the way you lie Neyo- mad Neyo- So sick So sick- Star cast Where I wanna be- Star cast (sung by luke james) Dance with my father again - Star cast ( Luke James) ~Honestly I can’t think of anymore songs right now~

I’m a heavy rock/screamo/metal fan, so they may not be for everyone, but I find BMTH’ “Don’t Go,” Five Finger Death Punch’s “I Remember Everything,” and BMIKE’s “Baby Don’t Cut” to be very sad songs about pain in general.
